lines.text: What is a blog?

spans.text: What is a blog?

lines.text: The word “blog,” a contraction of “web log,” is an informational web

spans.text: The word “blog,” a contraction of “web log,” is an informational web

lines.text: page that consists of discrete units called “posts.” The term “log” comes

spans.text: page that consists of discrete units called “posts.” The term “log” comes

lines.text: from the history of nautical navigation and originally referred to a

spans.text: from the history of nautical navigation and originally referred to a

lines.text: record of chronological events kept by a ship’s crew (Rettberg 30). Like

spans.text: record of chronological events kept by a ship’s crew (Rettberg 30). Like

lines.text: a ship’s log, blogs on the web tend to maintain an ordered chronology,

spans.text: a ship’s log, blogs on the web tend to maintain an ordered chronology,

lines.text: although they often unfold in reverse order. Blog posts are often shorter

lines.text: Composing a post

spans.text: Composing a post

lines.text: You want your blog to invite readers in and keep them coming back for updates. Great blogs are

spans.text: You want your blog to invite readers in and keep them coming back for updates. Great blogs are

lines.text: vibrant and visually interesting, but they are also thoughtful and purposeful. Every post matters

spans.text: vibrant and visually interesting, but they are also thoughtful and purposeful. Every post matters

lines.text: for generating and holding attention. Consider the following principles when composing:

spans.text: for generating and holding attention. Consider the following principles when composing:

lines.text: Make a point. While posts do not require a formal thesis or claim, it is important to have

spans.text: Make a point.
While posts do not require a formal thesis or claim, it is important to have

lines.text: an argument, opinion, or purpose in mind when you compose.

spans.text: an argument, opinion, or purpose in mind when you compose.

lines.text: Be concise. Use precise language and coherent syntax to make your posts easy to read.

spans.text: Be concise.
Use precise language and coherent syntax to make your posts easy to read.

lines.text: Post often. Blogs should be updated regularly to hold readers’ interest. Actively generate

spans.text: Post often.
Blogs should be updated regularly to hold readers’ interest. Actively generate

lines.text: new and interesting content on a daily or weekly schedule.

spans.text: new and interesting content on a daily or weekly schedule.

to appeal to diverse readers, broaden your blog’s

lines.text: scope, or refresh your own perspective on the project.

spans.text: Proofread.

lines.text: credible as a writer.

lines.text: Create visual interest. Consider which aspects of your content would pair well with

spans.text: Create visual interest.

lines.text: visual elements such as photographs, figures, or videos. Break up large chunks of text

lines.text: Using Multimedia

spans.text: Using Multimedia

lines.text: Audio and visual interest helps grab a reader’s attention. Blogs give writers the opportunity to use

spans.text: Audio and visual interest helps grab a reader’s attention. Blogs give writers the opportunity to use

lines.text: design, images, audio, and video to supplement their writing. Take advantage of these innovative

spans.text: design, images, audio, and video to supplement their writing. Take advantage of these innovative

lines.text: ways to enhance your presentation! Here are some guidelines to have in mind when you choose

spans.text: ways to enhance your presentation! Here are some guidelines to have in mind when you choose

spans.text: your blog’s multimedia elements:

spans.text: Use appropriate content, size, and quality.
Make sure your chosen images complement

lines.text: of a post. Choose the highest possible quality image while also making sure it is easy to
